thread.title: BRIEF-Virgin Atlantic Posts FY Pretax Loss Of 28.4 Mln Stg Vs. Profit Year-Ago

title: BRIEF-Virgin Atlantic Posts FY Pretax Loss Of 28.4 Mln Stg Vs. Profit Year-Ago
text: 35 AM / Updated 35 minutes ago BRIEF-Virgin Atlantic Posts FY Pretax Loss Of 28.4 Mln Stg Vs. Profit Year-Ago Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Virgin Atlantic: * FY LOSS BEFORE TAX AND EXCEPTIONAL ITEMS 28.4 MILLION STG VERSUS PROFIT OF 23 MILLION STG YEAR-AGO * FY TOTAL GROUP REVENUE OF 2.7 BILLION STG, DOWN 1 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR * FY PASSENGER LOAD FACTOR OF 78.3 PERCENT, DOWN 0.4 PTS YEAR-ON-YEAR * 5.3 MILLION PASSENGERS FLOWN IN 2017, DOWN 0.1 MILLION YEAR-ON-YEAR * INTRODUCING SECOND DAILY SERVICE TO JOHANNESBURG FROM WINTER 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
